io.micronaut.data.jpa.repository

Interface JpaRepository<E,ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The entity type
    ID - The ID type
    All Superinterfaces:
    CrudRepository<E,ID>, GenericRepository<E,ID>, PageableRepository<E,ID>

    public interface JpaRepository<E,ID>
extends CrudRepository<E,ID>, PageableRepository<E,ID>
    Simple composed repository interface that includes CrudRepository and PageableRepository.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
